title: Beyond the mind's eye
creator_credit: Michael Boydstun, Steven Churchill and Miramar
brief_description: Beyond the mind’s eye offers a compilation of computer animation from around the world. The emphasis is on psychodelic fantasy and “gee wiz” special effects, with original music by Jan Hammer. The viewer is taken on a surreal voyage that explores imaginative visions of a technological future, the outer reaches of the universe and alternate dimensions filled with colour and movement.
